name: Hidden Object: Mystery Exploration
description:
No any advertisement.
Unlimited Hints and much more....

In this game you have to look for hidden objects in various locations, mitstichnosti and full of mystery. Mystery Hidden Objects. You have to find ten objects that hidden on the pictures.
To pass each level, you must find all the hidden objects. If you need assistance, use the hint.

The game for all ages. Download now and enjoy more fun....
